mapper.sql: HYID, YHQID, JSRQ, CODE, JE, SHORTURL, MALLID, CXTYPE, HDID, STATUS, AMT
mapper.select:
select
from MEM_COUPON_ACCOUNT where CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS IN(1,2) AND JE>0 and to_char( SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd')<=to_char(jsrq,'yyyymmdd')
mapper.insert: insert into MEM_COUPON_ACCOUNT (HYID, YHQID, JSRQ, CODE, JE, SHORTURL, MALLID, CXTYPE, HDID, STATUS, AMT) values (#{hyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yhqid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{je,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shorturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mallid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cxtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hdid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into MEM_COUPON_ACCOUNT
HYID,
YHQID,
JSRQ,
CODE,
JE,
SHORTURL,
MALLID,
CXTYPE,
HDID,
STATUS,
AMT,
